Class ShieldImageTest

java.lang.Object
ImageClass.ShieldImageTest
public class ShieldImageTest extends Object
Test class for `ShieldImage`.

This class provides unit tests for the ShieldImage class, including its initialization and the behavior of showing or hiding the shield.

Source Code: GitHub Link

      public ShieldImageTest()

  • Method Details

    • setupJavaFX

      public static void setupJavaFX()
      Sets up the JavaFX environment before any tests are run.

      This ensures that the JavaFX platform is initialized if not already active.

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes the test environment before each test.

      Creates a new ShieldImage object with initial X and Y positions.

    • testInitialization

      public void testInitialization()
      Tests the initialization of the ShieldImage.

      Validates the initial position, visibility, and size of the shield image.

    • testShowShield

      public void testShowShield()
      Tests the `showShield` method of the ShieldImage.

      Verifies that the shield becomes visible when the method is invoked.

    • testHideShield

      public void testHideShield()
      Tests the `hideShield` method of the ShieldImage.

      Verifies that the shield becomes hidden when the method is invoked.
